definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: You 'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你算不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you be not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嘱不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: Something seems wrong with the light meter in my camera.
sentences.chinese: 我的摄影机里的曝光表好像出缺点了。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you are not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你拿不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: And there's an exposure meter in a case attached.
sentences.chinese: 另外还带有一个装曝光表的盒子。

sentences.english: You'd better consult the exposure meter if you're not sure of the time for exposure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你吃不准曝光时间，最好查一下曝光表。

sentences.english: The light meter is only meant to be used as as starting place.
sentences.chinese: 曝光表只是在起步阶段使用而已。

sentences.english: The amateur astronomer must consult the exposure meter and not rely on his senses.
sentences.chinese: 业余天文学家必须参照曝光表而不能光靠感觉。

sentences.english: Let's have a look at the exposure meter.

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
